dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3284 IH: Default Prevention Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Levin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until December 31, 2014.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Default Prevention Act of 2013.
Section 2 of the No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013 (31 U.S.C. 3101 note) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking date of the enactment of this Act each place it appears and inserting date of enactment of the Default Prevention Act of 2013;
in subsection (a), by striking May 18, 2013 and inserting December 31, 2014; and
in subsection (b), by striking May 19, 2013 each place it appears and inserting January 1, 2015.
